import os
import shutil
import subprocess

# Create test directory
test_dir = "test_sphinx_issue"
if os.path.exists(test_dir):
shutil.rmtree(test_dir)
os.makedirs(test_dir)
os.chdir(test_dir)

# Run sphinx-quickstart
subprocess.run([
"sphinx-quickstart",
"--no-sep",
"--project", "mypackage",
"--author", "me",
"-v", "0.1.0",
"--release", "0.1.0",
"--language", "en",
"docs"
], check=True)

# Create index.rst
with open("docs/index.rst", "w") as f:
f.write("""Welcome
=======

.. toctree::

mypackage
complex_doc
""")

# Create mypackage.rst (original test case)
with open("docs/mypackage.rst", "w") as f:
f.write(""":mod:`mypackage2`
=================

Content

Subheading
----------
""")

# Create complex_doc.rst (edge cases)
with open("docs/complex_doc.rst", "w") as f:
f.write(""":author: John Doe
:version: 1.0
:date: 2023-07-20

:class:`ComplexDocument`
=======================

This is a test document with multiple docinfo fields and domain directives.

Section with :func:`test_function`
--------------------------------

Normal content with :class:`inline` reference.

Another :mod:`module` Reference
-----------------------------

More content here.
""")

# Modify conf.py to add rst_prolog
with open("docs/conf.py", "a") as f:
f.write('\nrst_prolog = """\n.. |psf| replace:: Python Software Foundation\n"""\n')

# Build the documentation
os.chdir("docs")
subprocess.run(["sphinx-build", "-b", "html", ".", "_build"], check=True)

# Check if all the important elements appear in the output
with open("_build/index.html", "r") as f:
content = f.read()
success = True
missing = []

elements = ["mypackage2", "ComplexDocument", "test_function", "module"]
for element in elements:
if element not in content:
success = False
missing.append(element)

if success:
print("SUCCESS: All elements found in index.html")
else:
print("ERROR: The following elements were not found:", ", ".join(missing))
